forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
